text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump Perspective is required. Who better to give it than a marine infantry veteran. In the 19 years of the Vietnam war, 58,220 American souls were lost.  In 3 months under the Trump's leadership during #COVID19 pandemic, we have lost   50,243 as of 0800 04/24/2020. Time for #45 to go.
